name: PUZZLE: ULTIMATE
description:
PUZZLE: ULTIMATE - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get different pictures.

You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new levelFeatures:
  • Simple controls (mouse)
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Beautiful pictures.
  • Gameplay for children and adults.
Credits:
  • Programming: Artur Bikmullin (AFBIK Studio)
  • Music and effects: zapsplat
  • Pictures: Internet
